de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Class CardConnectionMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.CardSystemMonitor
      • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.CardConnectionMonitor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveCardConnectionMonitor

    public abstract class CardConnectionMonitor
extends CardSystemMonitor
    Abstract superclass to ease the implementation of monitors that connect to a card upon insertion.

    Subclasses must redefine onConnected() to take further actions after initial connection is established. The default will close the connection immediately.
